meanings.definition: The act of not disclosing information.
meanings.sent1: Her nondisclosure of the surprise party plans kept the secret safe.
meanings.sent2: The nondisclosure agreement prevented the leak of sensitive data.
meanings.sent3: The magician's nondisclosure of his tricks added to the mystery of his performance.
meanings.sent4: The nondisclosure of the treasure's location left the map seekers puzzled.
meanings.sent5: The nondisclosure of the secret ingredient made the recipe even more intriguing.

meanings.definition: The state of keeping information confidential.
meanings.sent1: The nondisclosure of the classified documents was crucial for national security.
meanings.sent2: In business, nondisclosure is often required to protect intellectual property.
meanings.sent3: The nondisclosure of the surprise party location led to a fun guessing game.
meanings.sent4: The nondisclosure of the hidden passage's location added an air of mystery to the old mansion.
meanings.sent5: The nondisclosure of the secret mission details heightened the suspense among the agents.
